content:
一、double和string之间

1、double转string

double a=1.2522;

string s=Convert.ToString(a);

2、string转double

String a = "5555";

// 示例 1
Double b = Double.Parse(a);

// 示例 2
b = Convert.ToDouble(a);

二、int和string之间

1、int转string

int a = 15;
//示例1
string s1 = a.ToString();
//示例二
string s2 = Convert.ToString(a);

2、string转int

string s = "18";
//示例一
int a1 = int.Parse(s);
//示例二
int a2;
int.TryParse(s, out a2);
//示例三
int a3 = Convert.ToInt32(s);

三、int与double

1、double转int

//强制转换
double number = 10.6;       //double类型变量并赋值
int num = (int)number; 
//四舍五入转换
double dbTmp = 234.54;
int iTmp = Convert.ToInt32(dbTmp);

2、int转double

//示例一
int i = 10;
Double d = Convert.ToDouble(10);

//示例二
int i = 10;
Double d = (Double)i;

取string字符串后几位数

string nc = "12345"

string b = nc.Remove(0, nc.Length - 2);

---b=“45”

取string字符串中某一段数据

string bb = nc.Substring(0, 4);

---bb =“1234”
